amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the National Heritage Area program by $8,408,000 and reduce funding for the Operation of the National Park System by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for National Recreation and Preservation by $8,408,000 offset by a reduction in funding for the Operation of the National Park System by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 238 (Roll no. 653).
